definition: to graft (a branch to a rootstock)
(of a woman) to marry/to marry off a daughter/to shift (blame etc)
to receive/to answer (the phone)/to meet or welcome sb/to connect/to catch/to join/to extend/to take one's turn on duty/to take over for sb

sentences.english: The branch or bud that is grafted is called the scion.
sentences.chinese: 嫁接上去的枝或芽被稱爲接穗。

sentences.english: The thesis expounds Ginkgo biloba L. green scion grafting technology.
sentences.chinese: 文內具體介紹了綠枝嫁接技術。

sentences.english: The factors influencing the graft rate of larch keampferi tree were studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究各因素對南方日本落葉松嫁接苗成活率的影響。

sentences.english: Use of tragus cartilage for grafting . [ comment ] .
Named cultivars are grafted onto seedling dogwoods.
sentences.chinese: 指定的品種嫁接到山茱萸的幼苗上。

sentences.english: He grafted a shoot in an old tree.
sentences.chinese: 他將一枝嫩枝嫁接到一顆老樹上。
這種肥皂嫁接是個不錯的辦法。

sentences.english: In plants, chimaeras produced from two different species are known as graft hybrids.
sentences.chinese: 在植物中，嵌合體是由兩個不同的嫁接雜種產生的。

sentences.english: When apple varieties were grafted to M. hupehensis, they showed good affinity. It is, therefore, recommended as a good rootstock for apple trees.
sentences.chinese: 嫁接蘋果品種親和性好，是一個良好的蘋果砧木。

sentences.english: In the rootstock sprout to leaf grafting as well.
sentences.chinese: 在砧木萌動到展葉期嫁接爲好。

sentences.english: She tried to engraft a peach on a plum.
sentences.chinese: 她試圖把桃樹嫁接在梨樹上。

sentences.english: Grafting can reduce the need to use pesticides on crops.
sentences.chinese: 嫁接可以減少植物對於農藥的使用量。

sentences.english: Graft mentor method is improving now.
sentences.chinese: 嫁接蒙導法也在不斷改進。

sentences.english: The village postman is an amateur with a grafting knife.
sentences.chinese: 鄉村郵遞員業餘也做嫁接刀工。

sentences.english: Pear trees are grafted on quince rootstocks.
sentences.chinese: 梨樹被嫁接到榲的根莖上。

definition: rootstock (stem onto which a branch is grafted)
scion (branch or bud that is grafted onto rootstock)
